titleStmt.title: Excellent contemplations, divine and moral written by the magnanimous and truly loyal Arthur Lord Capel, Baron of Hadham ; together with some account of his life, and his letters to several persons whilst he was prisoner in the tower ... likewise his affectionate letters to his lady, the day before his death ... March 9, 1648, with his pious advice to his son the late Earl of Essex.
titleStmt.author: Capel of Hadham, Arthur Capel, Baron, 1610?-1649.
Holland, Henry Rich, Earl of, 1590-1649. His speech on the Scaffold, March 9, 1649.

notesStmt.note: "Henry Lord Rich, Earl of Holland, His speech on the scaffold, immediately before his death, March 9, 1649"--p. 167.
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.

Copy at reel 1546:11 is a replacement for incomplete Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, copy found at reel 933:12 ([2], 88p.). Pages 77-78 torn with loss of print. Pages 67-88 from defective Union Theological Seminary copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of originals in the Union Theological Seminary Library and the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
